Hey Nep in my opinion the sport psychologist idea is a really good one Majority of people don t take eSports serious enough to realize that a psychologist can play an essential part to playing consistently at a very high level and being able to consistently handle the pressure situation we re put under I m in the National Team in my country for the sport I play Bowling and used to be afraid of the psychologist a if I wa crazy to see one or something However I started seeing a Sports Psychologist 2 year ago a I advanced from the youth to adult level and found so much clarity in the understanding of my own mental psyche and how to control it to respond appropriately to pressure situation I later used these experience from seeing the Sports Psychologist into my eSports career a well captaining a team of nobody into finishing 4th in a gaming league out of 24th an achievement considering no one gave u a chance to finish out of the bottom 5 Hope you actually go on to seeing a Sports Psychologist because it would clearly help you so much and be able to help you relax under pressure while still producing top quality content for u Keep up the great work Nep

hey nep im a huge fan been watching since fifa 13 i wa just wondering if anyone agrred with my problem with the price of pack in this game for example a 50k pack give 12 rare gold player so 2 x 50k pack is the same a a 100k pack which is fine but a 45k pack give 12 gold player and only 6 rares for just 5k le than a 50k pack which to me is just illogical because 2 x 45k pack is the same a 1 x 50k pack 1 gold player pack which is 12 5k because a gold player pack is 12 gold player 1 rare the 12 rares of a 50k pack what im saying is why should we have to pay 90k for 2 x 45k pack when you can get the same for a total value of 62 5k for a 50k 12 5k Also why is a rare gold pack which is 25k coin or 500 fifa point and a premium gold player pack that is also worth 25k coin or 350 fifa point when they have the same coin value according to ea Just to add in a mega pack which cost 35k coin or 700 fifa point you have a 4 5 chance of a 87 rated player and a 1 9 chance of a scream card but in a 45k pack or 600 fifa point you get a 4 chance of a 87 rated and a 1 8 chance of a scream card it s not a big difference but why is the 45k pack 10k more when it is 100 worse yet the mega pack is more fifa point but le coin i really hope you see this nep considering this is a first owner road to glory pack are a big part of the series and i think this is a good talking point keep up the great vids nep and i hope your family is good and well this formula theory can be applied to just about every pack type

As a solution to some player becoming extinct on the market during certain sbcs I think that every player should be able to be purchased directly from an EA catalogue in game at all time for either their maximum price range price or a little over For example if a player s price range is 2 000 to 35 000 coin you should be able to buy that player from a catalogue for 40 000 coin This would not affect the transfer market at all but prevent player from ever becoming extinct
